activity.title: ohcnetwork/leaderboard#409
activity.text:
@rithviknishad 
I have created separate file for parser where I collect the linked issues from pr body description, commits messages and UI linked issue. For UI linked issue, I am using graphql (https://stackoverflow.com/a/61940472). Let me know if there is any better way to do. I tested the same by making demo issue and prs in my own account, and it seems to work fine. 

Rest are the changes in sorting logic. 
Let me know the changes or improvements required.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/leaderboard#388
activity.text:
@rithviknishad 
I have used same DateRangePicker.tsx component which was used in Leaderboard page. 
I saw the above responsiveness issue for small screen is there in the Leaderboard page too. 

![image](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/leaderboard/assets/83684042/cfcb4e80-507f-40d7-bfbb-5e64381bfabc)

So, I have now made the DateRangePicker.tsx component responsive for smaller screen. 

Screenshots: 
1. In contributors page, on large screen. 
![image](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/leaderboard/assets/83684042/56b6ae85-81e9-446d-8f48-979e474ee55d)

2. In contributors page, on small screen. 
![image](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/leaderboard/assets/83684042/1c4a0d8e-a1fc-4f2e-9d04-300ba347a2b5)

3. In leaderboard page, on small screen. 
 
![image](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/leaderboard/assets/83684042/dac837da-85b1-431e-87a3-8e39bd341def)
